official-title.#text:
To amend title 46, United States Code, to reinstate
		  provisions requiring that a percentage of aid provided by the Secretary of
		  Agriculture or the Commodity Credit Corporation in the form of certain
		  agricultural commodities or their products must be transported on commercial
		  vessels of the United States, and for other purposes.
